original_text: “You shall make a table of acacia wood. Two cubits shall be its length, a cubit its breadth, and a cubit and a half its height.
korean_text: 너는 조각목으로 상을 만들되 길이는 두 규빗, 너비는 한 규빗, 높이는 한 규빗 반이 되게 하고

sentences.original_text: You shall make a table of acacia wood.
Two cubits shall be its length,
and a cubit and a half its height.
